# rich-inquirer

ðŸŽ¯ Interactive CLI prompts using [Rich](https://github.com/Textualize/rich), with Inquirer-style UX.

## Features

- [x] Text input with password support
- [x] Select / Fuzzy Select
- [x] Confirmation prompts
- [x] Prompt chaining via `PromptContext`

## Install

```bash
pip install rich-inquirer
